hybrid_body:
• Immediate: MoR + USDC to keep selling in 24–72h
• Parallel: 5 pre‑filled high‑risk apps + appeals kit
• Weekly check‑ins + escalation contacts

One price. One package. Two paths to survival.
disclaimer: MATCH removal is controlled by the listing acquirer; early removal is rare. Code 12 (PCI) has the best odds after full remediation.
